SCREW.TITLE: SCREW
SCREW.DETAILS: A screw is a fastener with a helical ridge, known as a thread, wrapped around a cylindrical shaft. It is used to join materials together by being rotated into a pre-drilled hole or directly into the material, providing secure attachment through its threading.

HUB.TITLE: HUB
HUB.DETAILS: A hub is a central network device that connects multiple devices, enabling communication. It operates at the physical layer, broadcasting data to all connected devices. Unlike a switch, it doesn't filter or direct data, making it less efficient for managing network traffic.

PLATE.TITLE: PLATE
PLATE.DETAILS: An industrial fan plate, also known as a mounting plate or fan plate, is a flat metal component used to securely attach an industrial fan to a structure. It ensures stability and proper alignment, aiding in efficient air circulation within industrial environments.

BLADE.TITLE: BLADE
BLADE.DETAILS: An industrial fan blade is a component designed to move air efficiently in large-scale environments. Made from materials like metal or reinforced plastic, these blades are engineered for durability and optimal airflow, essential for ventilation, cooling, and maintaining air quality in industrial settings.

CLAMP.TITLE: CLAMP
CLAMP.DETAILS: An industrial fan clamp is a device used to secure fan components, such as blades or ducts, in place. It ensures stability and safety by preventing movement during operation. Made from robust materials, these clamps are essential for maintaining the efficiency and reliability of industrial ventilation systems.

TAPER_BUSH.TITLE: TAPER BUSH
TAPER_BUSH.DETAILS: A taper bush, or taper lock bush, is a key component in industrial fans, used to securely mount pulleys or hubs onto shafts. It ensures a tight, aligned fit, preventing slippage and misalignment. The tapered design allows for easy installation and removal, enhancing maintenance efficiency and reliability. This secure connection is crucial for the smooth, efficient operation of industrial fans.
